head.title: NBC in Sydney: The Judges Frown

hedline.hl1: NBC in Sydney: The Judges Frown

block.p: Re ''NBC's Ratings for Olympics Are Worst Ever'' (front page, Sept. 20):
Re ''NBC's Ratings for Olympics Are Worst Ever'' (front page, Sept. 20):
Let me suggest another reason why ratings for the Olympics are low: now that the Games take place every two years, with summer and winter alternating, they're not as special.

With all the months of hype leading up to the Olympics every two years, it now almost seems as if they're always just around the corner. I remember as a child watching every minute of Olympic coverage because it seemed like such a rare treat.
And all those shmaltzy, up-close-and-personal profiles don't help either. Even my 5-year-old dislikes them. ''Not another one of those!'' he moans when they come on. ''I want to see the good stuff!''
ALICE LESCH KELLY Newton, Mass., Sept. 20, 2000
